Moira told me about the war of the dragons and asked me to defeat Horntail. Moira said that she will make me a secret medicine to transform if I bring him/her all the ingredients he/she had asked me, which I would need to get passed #p2081005# and enter Horntail's cave.. Let's get all the ingredients to Moira. Moira made me a secret medicine that can transform me into Cornian.
The prison is protected by a powerful spell and I can't get out of here before I die. For the sake of Nine Spirit and me, can you take the challenge to defeat the mighty Horntail?
You're brave. When I saw you the first time, I could feel the courage you have. I'll give you some information.

Horntail beat Nine Spirit but he has severe injuries. He's in the #bCave of Life#k looking for a cure. The entrance of Cave of Life is right down there. Horntail's protector, #bKeroben#k is guarding the entrance.
You need to transform into a Cornian to get into the cave. If you gather all the ingredients, I'll make you #bsecret medicine#k so you can change into a Cornian.

Did you memorize everything?
You'll need to get the Cornian's Marrow and a skull shoulder guard from #rCornian#k, Manon's Cry from #rManon#k in Minar Forest, and tough dragon leather from #rDrakes#k on Victoria Island.
You can get the most important thing, the Cornian Dagger, from #bMos#k, the best blacksmith in the Leafre town. Hurry up! I'll be waiting for you.
If you leave Horntail, Ossyria as well as Minar Forest will be in constant danger! Think it over, please!
Did you gather everything? Let me see. Great!! Wait a second.
If you take this medicine, you will look like Cornian for a while. But, keep this in mind. This medicine doesn't work well so when you're out of this town, it won't work. Keep in mind that.
Good luck to you!! Please eliminate Horntail!
